actions.text: On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 267 (Roll no. 515).

description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for fossil energy research and development by $163.6 million.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 65 in the Congressional Record of July 12, 1995, to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for fossil energy research and development by $165 million, from $385 million to $221 million.
